item.title: Pamela add a quote by China Miéville
item.description: "A trap is only a trap if you don't know about it. If you know about it, it's a challenge." -- China Miéville

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Paolo Coelho
item.description: "I don't regret the painful times; I bare my scars as if they were medals." -- Paolo Coelho

item.title: Pamela add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If I am really a part of your dream, you'll come back one day." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Steve Jobs
item.description: "Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful... that's what matters to me." -- Steve Jobs

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy
